text: Hi everyone, I'm a research fellow at University of Liverpool (UK). I've been using R for over 10 years now. I started using it to analyse atmospheric data but now I have moved into health research domain, and am a member of the core development team for DataSHIELD (<https://www.datashield.ac.uk>) - an open source project using the R analytic environment for privacy preseving data analysis. I have joined R Forwards to promote disability inclusion in the content/activities from the group.
